metadata.synopsis: A group of bandits in an abandoned chapel - they're hoping to loot the place and are a little on edge. Abandoned chapels often have traps or undead guardians. they're startled by a loud noise from one of the side-chambers. The roof just caved in, and the bandit are trying to figure out a plan of action. What they don't know is that the roof collapse was caused by the players who just broke in.

1.speaker: Mari
1.text: Gods, there's something moving in there!
1.context: NodeContext: a roof in the dungeon they're exploring just collapsed - they're getting into position to investigate/ambush anyone involved and are scared

4.speaker: Andorn
4.text: Be ready for anything. I told you this wouldn't be easy...
4.context: NodeContext: these characters are robbing an abandoned chapel and the roof in one of the rooms just collapsed. They don't know what's happening and are VERY twitchy. The roof in one of the rooms just collapsed, and they're reacting to the sound. This guy is the pragmatic one of the bandit group - robbing crypts is dangerous work, and he knows it. Doesn't necessarily like it though
